name: NodeSchool Denton
body:
## Upcoming Events:

 -  Node.js/JavaScript Intro: 8/8 @10a-noon at the Denton North Library (link TBD)
 -  [NodeSchool: Sunday 8/16 @1:30p at the Emily Fowler Library](http://www.meetup.com/Denton-Alternative-Economy-Doing-Group/events/224039006/)

## Node.js:

Node.js offers the ability to express web applications in ways and environments in exciting new ways.

NodeSchool Denton is a chapter of the international [NodeSchool.io](http://nodeschool.io/), creating a container for learning Node.js - used in web programming, robotics, and enabling new kinds of networked applications.

NodeSchool's [self-paced workshops](http://nodeschool.io/#workshoppers) break down learning into delicious bite-sized chunks. Bring a laptop, and if you can, [install Node.js](https://nodejs.org/).

We get together about once a month, share some Node.js news, do Node.js workshops, and work on projects.  We're pretty informal, come join us if you like :-)

-- Node up!
